bq_l.label: becquerel per litre
bq_l.definition: Radioactivity unit per litre. SI unit.

degree_celcius.label: degree Celsius
degree_celcius.definition: Temperature unit. Expressed in degree Celsius.

kilogram_per_year.label: kilogram per year
kilogram_per_year.definition: Mass flow rate. Conversion to SI unit: 1 kg/s = 31536000 t/a. Used for loads or emissions of hazardous substances.

kilometre.label: kilometre
kilometre.definition: Length unit. Conversion to SI base unit: 1m=10^-3km

square_kilometre.label: square kilometre
square_kilometre.definition: Length unit. Conversion to SI unit: 1m2=10^-6km2

mg_l.label: milligram per litre
mg_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion to SI unit: 1 kg/m3 = 10^3 mg/L

mg_g.label: milligram per gram
mg_g.description: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^3 mg/g

mg_kg.label: milligram per kilogram
mg_kg.definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^6 mg/kg

mg_caco3_l.label: milligram of Calcium Carbonate per litre
mg_caco3_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Calcium Carbonate per volume.

mg_c_l.label: milligram of Carbon per litre
mg_c_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Carbon per volume.

mg_nh3_l.label: milligram of Ammonia per litre
mg_nh3_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Ammonia per volume.

mg_nh4_l.label: milligram of Ammonium per litre
mg_nh4_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Ammonium per volume.  Conversion factor: 1 mg{N}/L = 1.2888 mg{NH4}/L

mg_no2_l.label: milligram of Nitrite per litre
mg_no2_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrite per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{N}/L = 3.2845 mg{NO2}/L

mg_no3_l.label: milligram of Nitrate per litre
mg_no3_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{N}/L = 4.4268 mg{NO3}/L

mg_n_l.label: milligram of Nitrogen per litre
mg_n_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrogen per volume.

mg_o2_l.label: milligram of Oxygen per litre
mg_o2_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Oxygen per volume.

mg_po4_l.label: milligram of Phosphate per litre
mg_po4_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{P}/L = 3.0662 mg{PO4}/L

mg_p_l.label: milligram of Phosphorus per litre
mg_p_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Phosphorus per volume.

mg_sio3.label: milligram of Silicate per litre
mg_sio3.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Silicate per volume. Conversion factor: 1 mg{Si}/L = 2.7090 mg{SiO3}/L

mg_si_l.label: milligram of Silicon per litre
mg_si_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Silicon per volume.

mg_s_l.label: milligram of Sulphur per litre
mg_s_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Sulfur per volume.

mmol_l.label: millimole per litre
mmol_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion to the SI unit: 1 mol/m3 = 1 mmol/L

mole.label: mole
mole.definition: Amount of substance unit. SI base unit.

mol_m3.label: mol per cubic metre
mol_m3.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. SI unit.

ng_l.label: nanogram per litre
ng_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion to SI unit: 1 kg/m3 = 10^9 ug/L

ng_g.label: nanogram per gram
ng_g.definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^9 ng/g

ng_kg.label: nanogram per kilogram
ng_kg.definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^12 ng/kg

tonne_per_year.label: tonne per year
tonne_per_year.definition: Mass flow rate. Conversion to SI unit: 1 kg/s = 31536 t/a. Used for loads or emissions of nutrients of oxygen consuming substances.

microsiemens_cm.label: microsiemens per centimetre
microsiemens_cm.definition: Electrical conductivity unit. Conversion to SI unit: 1 S/m = 10^4 uS/cm

ug_l.label: microgram per litre
ug_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Conversion to SI unit: 1 kg/m3 = 10^6 ug/L

ug_g.label: microgram per gram
ug_g.definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^6 ug/g

ug_kg.label: microgram per kilogram
ug_kg.definition: Mass ratio unit. Conversion factor: 1 kg/kg = 10^9 ug/kg

ug_n_l.label: microgram of Nitrogen per litre
ug_n_l.definition: Mass concentration unit. Expressed in mass of Nitrogen per volume.

ug_teq_kg.label: microgram TEQ per kilogram
ug_teq_kg.definition: Toxic equivalent (TEQ)  weighted mass ratio unit.

umol_l.label: micromole per litre
umol_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Conversion to the SI unit: 1 mol/m3 = 10^3 umol/L

umol_c_l.label: micromole of Carbon per litre
umol_c_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Carbon per volume.

umol_n_l.label: micromole of Nitrogen per litre
umol_n_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Nitrogen per volume.

umol_o2_l.label: micromole of Oxygen molecules per litre
umol_o2_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Oxygen molecules per volume.

umol_p_l.label: micromole of Phosphorus per litre
umol_p_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Phosphorus per volume.

umol_si_l.label: micromole of Silicon per litre
umol_si_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Silicon per volume.

umol_s_l.label: micromole of Sulfur per litre
umol_s_l.definition: Amount of substance concentration unit. Expressed in amount of Sulfur molecules per volume.

molarratio.label: molar ratio
molarratio.definition: Amount of substance ratio. Dimensionless: mol/mol

presence.label: presence or absence
presence.definition: Presence or absence of a given property.
